title: Two Bedroom (All Ensuite) — Kilimani (off Agwings Kodhek Road)
short: Modern two-bedroom apartment — both ensuite, balcony, shared rooftop gym & pool.
desc: Modern two-bedroom apartment, both ensuite, located in Kilimani just off Agwings Kodhek Road. Spacious living room, fitted kitchen and secure parking.

title: Two Bedroom (All Ensuite) — Off Lenana Road
short: Stylish two-bedroom apartment (all ensuite) near Yaya Centre. Generator and secure parking.
desc: Stylish two-bedroom apartment (all ensuite) located off Lenana Road. Modern finishes, backup generator and 24-hour security. Walking distance to shops and malls.

title: One Bedroom Apartment — Tatu City
short: One-bedroom modern apartment in secure gated Tatu City community.
desc: Elegant one-bedroom apartment within Tatu City offering modern fittings, balcony and secure parking. Ideal for professionals and small families.
